title: 4/2.5 2535sf Townhouse Directly On Dickinson Square Park To Rent
description:
This is a real posting. I am the owner. Feel free to get in touch. The listing is on zillow as well if you need to confirm it's real. Thanks.
2535 square foot, 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath house with tall ceilings, wood floors and central air on a shady block directly on Dickinson Square park (and playground) for rent from August 15 (ish) 2022 to August 15 (ish) 2023. No continuation of lease or shorter term considered. We can be flexible by days or weeks. Absolutely NO SMOKERS or smoking in the house. House trained pets are welcome!
The good sized rear bedrooms along with the living and dining room have had the original oak floors uncovered. The brand new kitchen just doubled in size. The front bedrooms are huge and designed as master suites. They overlook the park and are filled with morning light. The 3rd floor rear bedroom has broad westerly views and tremendous light.
Possibly partially furnished if you're interested, but not required. The lovely catchment elementary school is Kirkbride. The free (this area does not require a sticker/permit) street parking is relatively easy given the park (no houses on the other side of the street). Before 6pm we can almost always park right on our block. After 6pm we never have to park more than a block or two away.
The neighbors on this block are great - a mix of families, kids, renters. The Delaware River trail is a 7 minute walk. Biking or transiting downtown is under 10 minutes. There are myriad food and drink options in the neighborhood, or take a quick walk to Passyunk Avenue. Multiple grocery stores, corner stores and Target are also a quick walk. Farmer's market in the park every Sunday.
Water is included. You're responsible for gas, electric and internet. We're happy to answer questions about the house, the neighborhood, schools, etc. Or come by and see it and ask questions in person! If you're out of town we can give you a video walk through. We wish you all luck in your search. Thanks.

title: Rent with the right to purchase
description:
Rent with the right to purchase program
I’m a PA real estate agent experienced in doing rent with the right to purchase deals for people who are looking to lock in their rent and home price, and move into the house they want to live in now. Avoid future out of control rent increases!
The best way to buy a home is to buy it outright, which is also something I can assist with so please get in touch! However this rent with the right to purchase program works great for people who might not be able or willing to make the commitment to buy a house right this moment.
I work with a company called Home Partners that will purchase a home of your choosing. No mortgage approval is needed until you want to buy it. You don’t pick from a small list, but from all houses that are for sale on the market so long as it fits the program guidelines (which honestly does limit options in our Philly market because homes must be built no earlier than 1978, no fixer uppers, only purchase in certain areas, etc. But that’s why I’m here to help and show you which homes work for this awesome program!) Some current examples that could work are in the photos.
Once Home Partners buys the house you choose, they rent it to you at a pre-set price. You can choose to rent it for up to 5 years and you can buy it at anytime during those 5 years. Each year the rent and purchase price will increase but it is set in advance so you’re never surprised. If the housing market improves and you want to buy a different house, you can walk away with no obligation beyond your rental lease. If house prices go up, the price on your home is already locked in and you have the right to buy it without any competing buyers or bidding wars.
This is a rent with the right to purchase program, NOT a rent to own. So the rent you pay does not get credited to your home purchase. But in this market, what a great opportunity to lock in your pricing and avoid the headache of having to move again. Plus you can bring your pets! Yes, even large dogs. Some restrictions apply.
Basics you’ll need to apply and qualify:
-620 or better FICO score for all applicants
-Application fee paid directly to Home Partners of $75 per household (not refundable). I will first have you do a free pre-qualification.
-Documented income. Self employed welcome to apply with last years tax return and 2 months bank statements.
-Income minimum 3x the monthly rent. Keep in mind that most homes that qualify for this program have rents over $2000 per month and are single family homes or row homes (no condos)
-Security deposit equal to 2 months rent
Get in touch to learn how you can move into your dream home now and buy it later- never move again if you don’t want to!

title: Serenity Now
description:
Welcome to this beautiful updated end unit town home in desirable Knolls of Birmingham! Looking for maintenance free living with scenic walking trails, a real pond, pool and tennis and pickleball courts? How about snow shoveled up to your front door and garage? complete lawn and landscaping care? Located in award winning Unionville-Chadds Ford Schools including Blue Ribbon Chadds Ford Elementary, this maintenance free home has been well cared for with many recent updates including new decorator light fixtures, recessed lighting in many rooms, updates to the half bath, primary bath and laundry room. The basement has been completely finished adding a 4th bedroom or additional home office, new flooring, lighting and a brand new 3rd full bath. This home has been professionally painted with custom classic paint colors. The living space is exceptional offering a large formal living room with wood burning fireplace, formal dining room, den, large sun filled kitchen which offers granite, newer KitchenAid appliances, new hardware and large breakfast nook. Private rear deck just off the 1st floor den. Don't miss the gleaming hardwood floors throughout the first level, custom woodwork, plantation shutters, two-inch blinds and much more. Cavernous primary suite offering his & her's walk-in closets with custom closet systems, an en suite full bath with large jacuzzi tub, shower stall, double vanity and linen closet. Two ample additional bedrooms on the second level share a full hall bathroom and an updated laundry room finishing off the second level. The lower level has a large 2nd family room, recreational area, a 4th bedroom or home office, luxurious full bath and an enormous amount of storage. This end unit townhome sits off Lea Drive, the main private street, on a separate driveway apron providing extra safety and beautiful street and surrounding scenic grounds. The exterior has newer HardiePlank, gutters, roof and fabulous exterior lighting replaced recently and over the past 5 years. Truly maintenance free living at it's finest! The Knolls of Birmingham is a wonderful walking community with a paved trail system, beautiful open space, a community pool and clubhouse, private tennis courts. The walking trail is connected to the incredible Sandy Hollow Battlefield park and trail system adding miles of extra scenic and historic open space...it's like being on vacation all year long! This home is very efficient with very low utility costs. Owner is a PA licensed real estate agent.

description:
Cozy, rustic cabin in the desert. If you love camping indoors, solitude and peaceful quiet surroundings, this is the place for you! Located in the small town of Philadelphia , a little over a two hour drive from the Orange County. Only about 100 people reside here with only a gas station, post office and quicky mart in town, you need to drive 20 miles to Ridgecrest for groceries, hardware, and the other necessities of life. A wood stove heats the cabin and you pay the utilities. Internet is available. Bring your own electric stove and fridge, washer and dryer. The property has a small yard with a pomegranate tree and an observation deck on the roof. Bring your off road vehicles and mining equipment as it’s all accessible from your front door. Perfect for the avid minimalist, pets are welcome

title: This beautiful 2nd and 3rd floor unit
description:
Welcome to 1932 Christian St. This beautiful 2nd and 3rd floor unit is in the perfect location for your new home! Through the main vestibule you'll enter your unit on the main floor where you'll have access to a fully unfinished basement offering a load of storage space and your washer/dryer. Up on the main floor you have an open floor plan with your eat-in kitchen and living space. Large windows let in a ton of natural light and high ceilings make this space feel twice it's size. Off the hallway you have your first full bathroom as well as a large main floor bedroom with double closets. title: Center City Philadelphia Apartments for you
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃƒÂƒÃ‚ÂƒÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â‚ÃƒÂƒÃ‚Â‚ÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃƒÂƒÃ‚ÂƒÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â‚ÃƒÂƒÃ‚Â‚ÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.ÃƒÂƒÃ‚ÂƒÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â‚ÃƒÂƒÃ‚Â‚ÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. title: Restored Town House next to Penn, Pet Friendly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. title: Delightful Tudor-style 5 bed, 2.5 bath West Mount Airy home
description:
Wellesley Rd,  Character and charm abound in this delightful Tudor-style 5 bed, 2.5 bath West Mount Airy home, within easy walking distance of West Mt Airy Village and only two blocks from Wissahickon trails.  On a quiet tree-lined block, this home is full of character, inside and out. Enter the house through the glazed sunroom with built-in window seats and custom window screens. The sunroom leads to the living room which features a wood-burning stone fireplace and inlaid hardwood floors. The dining room adjoins the kitchen, creating an open and bright floor plan. The contemporary kitchen, complete with stainless appliances and breakfast bar leads to a new raised deck, a great spot for al fresco dining. An added bonus on the first floor is the convenient powder room. On the second floor are three sunny bedrooms and a fully renovated full bathroom with tub and linen closet. The third floor has two further bedrooms, one currently used as an office, with  views across the Mt. Airy rooftops from the window seat. Also, on the third floor is a second full bathroom with clawfoot tub. The unfinished basement houses the washer/dryer and provides ample storage space.  Outside is a detached garage and shared brick driveway. Walk to all Mt. Airy has to offer - trails, library, coffee shops and restaurants, Weaver's Way Co-op, commuter SEPTA, plus easy access to Lincoln Drive for routes into Center City.

title: Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Home, Lounge, Gym, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 13, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* One bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!

title: Filter Square Gem! This 3 bed 2 bath house has it all!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available July 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

title: This is an amazing home located on a quiet block
description:
This is an amazing home located on a quiet block in the heart of Northern Liberties, just around the corner from the Piazza and Liberties Walk, and steps away from dozens of neighborhood restaurants including Apricot Stone, El Camino Real, Hikari Sushi and Urban Village Brewing Company. Upon entering you will notice the open and inviting floor plan. The first floor has hardwood flooring, high ceilings , a bathroom, a gas fireplace, and a piano. Light pours through the kitchen from the backyard through a glass door that leads to an outdoor city oasis, including a patio AND grass! The basement has a custom bar and pool table for entertaining. Venturing upstairs to the 2nd floor, you will find a cozy back bedroom and large front bedroom with a renovated bathroom, a front-loading washer and dryer, and large walk-in closet. The 3rd floor features a large home office that could double as an extra bedroom. French doors open into the primary bedroom, which boasts large closet space, hardwood flooring, and a fully renovated bath with dual shower heads. The home is full of character, with custom built-ins and solid wood doors, and has been featured in Design Home, Nest, Apartment Therapy, and Philadelphia Magazine. The home has a nest thermostat and ADT security set up. There is permit parking on the block, neighborhood favorite One Shot Cafe on the corner, and both Heirloom Market and Acme only a block away!

title: One Bedroom In Haverford, Close To Train & Dining
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
